programme.title: The Beekeeper
programme.desc: An apparently unassuming man finds someone very important to him has been scammed and driven to harm. Revealed as a former operative of a powerful and clandestine organisation known as 'Beekeepers', he sets out on a brutal quest of vengeance, hunting those responsible for the incident, who have seriously underestimated how much of a threat he is. programme.title: Matilda
programme.sub-title: Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Drama, Children's ║ 1996 ║ PG
programme.desc: Comic fantasy based on the book by Roald Dahl, starring Mara Wilson and Danny DeVito. programme.title: Over the Hedge
programme.sub-title: Comedy, Family, Drama, Animation, Action, Children's ║ 2006 ║ U
programme.desc: Animated comedy adventure featuring the voices of Bruce Willis, Garry Shandling and Steve Carell. When Vincent the bear wakes from his winter hibernation to find that scheming raccoon RJ has stolen his stash of food, he gives RJ a deadline to return it, or else. programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview-August 2024
programme.desc: Going to the cinema isn’t the cheap date it used to be, so be sure to make the most of these offers to watch a movie for less. Here are the best ways to get cheap cinema tickets this month.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda
programme.sub-title: Comedy, Family, Drama, Animation, Action, Fantasy, Children's ║ 2008 ║ PG
programme.desc: Animated adventure featuring the voices of Jack Black, Dustin Hoffman and Angelina Jolie. Ancient China: Po the Panda lives in the Valley of Peace and dreams of becoming a kung fu master despite the fact he is clumsy, overweight and a complete beginner at martial arts. So when he's accidentally chosen to be the legendary Dragon Warrior, he is overjoyed. programme.title: Bridget Jones's Diary
programme.desc: Romantic comedy adapted from the bestselling novel by Helen Fielding, starring Renée Zellweger, Colin Firth and Hugh Grant. Weight-obsessed 30-something Bridget Jones is busy lamenting her lack of a good man when two come along at once: her flirtatious boss Daniel Cleaver and uptight childhood friend Mark Darcy. In the freezing Antarctic, Emperor penguins find their soul mate through their own unique "heart song". Unfortunately for young bird Mumble, he can't sing a note, but he can tap dance brilliantly. Social rejection soon follows, leading his "happy feet" to be blamed for a colony-threatening fish famine. programme.desc: Fantasy action adventure based on the Marvel comic, starring Tobey Maguire, Willem Dafoe and Kirsten Dunst. programme.title: Charlie Wilson's War
programme.desc: Biographical comedy drama starring Tom Hanks, Julia Roberts and Philip Seymour Hoffman. In 1980s Washington, charismatic Texas politician Charles Wilson is notorious for his hard-drinking, drug-taking and womanising lifestyle, earning the nickname "Good Time Charlie". programme.title: Fletch Lives
programme.desc: Comedy mystery starring Chevy Chase and Julianne Phillips. programme.desc: Some of the best soundtracks of Bollywood uncut.

programme.title: Baazi
programme.desc: A tough and honest police officer wages a one-man war against terrorists and a corrupt politician who have planned to assassinate the chief minister of the state.

programme.title: Mera Gaon Mera Desh
programme.desc: (1971) An ex-convict comes to a village and decides to take on a dreaded bandit who has terrorised the region.

programme.title: Tiranga
programme.desc: (1992) The story of an army officer and a cop who come together to foil the evil designs of some traitors and uphold the glory and splendour of their motherland. Stars Nana Patekar.

programme.title: Karma
programme.desc: (1986) Subhash Ghai directs this saga of revenge by Dada Thakur (Dilip Kumar) on Dr. Dang (Anupam Kher) as he recruits three deadly prisoners Khairuddun, Baiju and Johnny for his mission.

programme.title: Rashtra Kavach OM
programme.desc: (Movie @6) After losing his memory while fighting enemies, Om has to battle terrorists and amnesia in order to restore his father's honour after his old man was arrested for betraying his country.

programme.title: Attack
programme.desc: A terrorist attack renders Arjun paralysed and distraught with the thoughts of his dead lover. So, when the attacker returns, Arjun participates in an experiment to seek revenge.

programme.title: Commando A One-Man Army
programme.desc: (2013) Karan Dogra, an Indian commando, termed him as a terrorist as he lands into another country. He manages to escape and bumps in Simrit who is in trouble.

programme.title: Aparichit
programme.desc: Story of a man who is a meek lawyer by the day and an undertaker by night, who goes all out against the bad elements of the society with his gruesome murders.

programme.title: Lakshya
programme.desc: This movie was so famous for its songs and choreography and it also won many awards inc. Best Cinematographer, Best Choreography.

programme.title: Purab Aur Paschim
programme.desc: (1970) Bharat (Manoj Kumar) goes to Britain to study. He is shocked to find that the Indians there, shun India and Indians. He takes it upon himself to teach them Indian values.

programme.title: Pardes
programme.desc: Alka Yagnik won the 'Best Singer - Female' award, Mahima Chaudhry won the 'Best Debut Actress award and Subhash Ghai won the 'Best Screenplay' at the Filmfare Awards 1998.

programme.title: Raazi
programme.desc: The film was priased and won several awards including, 'Best Actress, Best Playback Singer - Male, Best Playback Singer - Female, Best Lyrics, Best Film'.

programme.title: Gadar 2
programme.desc: (Movie @6) Tara Singh goes missing during a skirmish and is believed to be captured in Pakistan, his son Jeete sets out to rescue him and enters a labyrinth from which they both must escape.

programme.title: Parmanu: The Story Of Pokhran
programme.desc: (2018) A look at India's second confidential nuclear test series at Pokhran led by Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam, during the time of PM Atal Bihari Vajpayee's tenure.

programme.title: Phone Bhoot
programme.desc: A ghost reaches out to two bumbling ghostbusters for a business idea. However, their plans go downhill as the eerie ghost reveals her plan.

programme.title: Pure Bollywood
programme.desc: Some of the best soundtracks of Bollywood uncut.

programme.title: Tumbbad
programme.desc: The film was praised globally and won several awards like best cinematographer, best production designer, best special effects, best film, and best feature film.

programme.title: Ek Aur Ek Gyarah
programme.desc: Govinda and Sanjay Dutt play 2 petty thieves, who are forced by gangsters to kidnap a child in return for their mother. Will they risk the child's life for selfish reasons?

programme.title: Ravanasura
programme.desc: Ravindra, An inept junior lawyer at a law firm, agrees to help a business magnate clear her father's name of murder. However, when bodies start piling up, Ravindra begins to show his true colours.

programme.title: Mehboob Ki Mehandi
programme.desc: Shabana is employed by Yusuf, a rich man, to teach his nephew. Eventually, Yusuf and Shabana fall in love and plan to get married. But the girl has a troubled past that may destroy her future.

programme.title: Kites
programme.desc: Ayananka Bose won an award for the 'Best Cinematography' at the Zee Cine Awards 2011.

programme.title: Agent Vinod
programme.desc: (2012) The saga of love, deceit and danger as an Indian spy, Vinod (Saif Ali Khan), travels worldwide to unravel a conspiracy. Kareena plays his lady love. A film by Sriram Raghavan.

programme.title: Jawani Jaaneman
programme.sub-title: (2020) (Movie @6) A 40-year-old playboy's life turns upside down when he comes to know that he has a 20 something year-o
programme.desc: Saif Ali Khan, Alaya Furniturewala and Tabu.

programme.title: Tarla
programme.desc: The journey of India's iconic home chef, Tarla Dalal. It captures the integral role she played in empowering women and helping them realise their dreams through food.

programme.title: Dil Dhadakne Do
programme.desc: Anil Kapoor and Shefali Shah won 'Best Supporting Role' award at the Stardust Awards 2016. Ranveer Singh won 'Most Entertaining Actor' at the Big Star Entertainment Awards 2015.

programme.title: Sanam Teri Kasam
programme.desc: When Saraswati's father throws her out of the house, Inder stands with her against all odds and this brings them close to each other. However, destiny has its own plans.

programme.title: Don 2
programme.desc: Shah Rukh Khan won many awards for this movie. This is one of the highest grossing film of 2011.

programme.title: Yamla Pagla Deewana
programme.desc: A married Canadian travels to India to re-unite with his estranged father and brother but faces obstacles and challenges.

programme.title: Rockstar
programme.desc: The film was praised and won several awards including, 'Best Actor, Best Lyricist, Best Music Director, Best Playback Singer - Male/Female, Best Actor - Movie'.

programme.title: Fukrey Returns
programme.desc: (2017) Just out of jail, a don is ready to get back at the four friends who conned her. Starring Pulkit Samrat, Richa Chadha, Varun Sharma and Ali Fazal.

programme.title: Suraj Pe Mangal Bhari
programme.desc: (Saturday Superhits) Suraj, an eligible bachelor, keeps getting rejected by the families of prospective brides. Soon, he uncovers that it is because of a detective named Madhu Mangal Rane.

programme.title: Code Name: Tiranga
programme.desc: Tasked with capturing a wanted criminal, an undercover spy sets out on a perilous mission. However, things become complicated when her heart is pulled into it.

programme.title: Welcome To New York
programme.desc: A recovery agent and a designer become part of a big Bollywood event in New York, where chaos ensues, changing their lives forever.

programme.title: Mr India
programme.desc: The film won many accolades, at the first Star and Style - Lux Awards - best Film (Boney Kapoor), best director (Shekhar Kapur), best actor (Anil Kapoor), and best actress (Sridevi).

programme.title: Sooryavanshi
programme.desc: Rohit Shetty won the 'Cinematic Disruptor' award at the Hello! Hall of Fame Awards 2022. Akshay Kumar won the 'Favorite Actor' award at the Nickelodeon Kids' Choice Awards 2022.

programme.title: Parichay
programme.desc: (1972) Desperate for work, Ravi takes up the challenge of teaching five spoilt brats who have managed to drive away all previous tutors.

programme.title: Koyla
programme.desc: A woman who was tricked into marriage falls in love with her evil husband's mute servant, and is locked in a room while her husband tries to get rid of her lover.

programme.title: Maine Pyar Kiya
programme.desc: The film was praised and won many awards such as 'Best Debut Actor, Best Film, Best Music Director, Best Lyricist, Best Playback Singer - Male' at the Filmfare Awards 1990.

programme.title: Baazigar
programme.desc: (UK TV Premiere) Shah Rukh won the 'Best Actor' award at the 39th Filmfare Awards - in 1994, the movie was also awarded for Best Music Director, Best Singer, and Best Screenplay.

programme.title: Jawan
programme.desc: A high-octane action thriller which outlines the emotional journey of a man who is set to rectify the wrongs in the society.

programme.title: Kedarnath
programme.desc: Sara Ali Khan won the 'Best Debut Actress' award at the Awards of the International Indian Film Academy 2019, Filmfare Awards 2019, Screen Awards, in 2020.

programme.title: Ek Vivah Aisa Bhi
programme.desc: When circumstances force Prem (Sonu Sood) and Chandni (Isha Koppikar) to postpone their wedding, little do they know that the waiting period will last for over a decade.

programme.title: Thalaivi
programme.desc: A biopic on the late Tamil Nadu Chief Minister J Jayalalithaa.

programme.title: Iqbal
programme.desc: (Raksha Bandhan Spl) The film was praised and won several awards including, 'Best Actor, Best Actress, Best Film, Best Actress in a Supporting Role, Best Actor in a Supporting Role, Best Story'.

programme.title: Pyari Behna
programme.desc: (Raksha Bandhan Spl) Kaali (Mithun Chakravarty) gets suspended by his boss Vinay (Vinod Mehra) for an accident. Kaali's sister Seeta (Tanvi Azmi) loves Vinay but Kaali won't let them marry. (1985).

programme.title: Ramaiya Vastavaiya
programme.desc: (Raksha Bandhan Spl) City boy Ram falls in love with village belle Sona, who has been raised by her brother, Raghuveer. When his mother insults Sona, Raghuveer asks Ram to prove himself worthy.

programme.title: Raksha Bandhan
programme.desc: (Raksha Bandhan Spl) Lala Kedarnath is blessed with 4 sisters. But his worry is to find suitable grooms for each of them, as only then can he marry his childhood love.

programme.title: Hum Saath Saath Hain
programme.desc: (Raksha Bandhan Spl) Jayanti Shevale won an award for 'Best Make Up' at the Awards of the International Indian Film Academy 2000.

programme.title: Army
programme.desc: (1994) Drama about Geeta (Sridevi) who, with a group of young lads, seeks revenge on the dreaded gangster Nagraj (Danny Denzongpa) for killing her husband Arjun (Shahrukh Khan).

programme.title: Strangers
programme.desc: (2007) Two strangers meet on a train journey, talk and decide to eliminate each other's spouses to alleviate themselves of the hell they are trapped in.

programme.title: Desh Premee
programme.desc: (1982) Patriot Dinanath is tragically separated from his wife and daughter. His son Raju is into illegal activities. Will Dinanath find out that his son is not what he thinks he is?

programme.title: Jaanwar
programme.desc: Badshah is raised by Sultan and grows up to becomes a criminal. He changes his ways after he falls in love with Sapna, but Sultan returns to remind him of his past.

programme.title: Players
programme.desc: A team comprising a con man, an automobile expert, a hacker, an actor and an illusionist plan a daring heist, little knowing of the betrayal that lies ahead! (2012).

programme.title: Anjaana Anjaani
programme.desc: When a suicidal Akash plans to jump off the Manhattan bridge, he meets a heartbroken Kiara there. The two decide to accomplish their unfulfilled wishes before they end their lives.

programme.title: Kaala Sona
programme.desc: (Movie @6) Rakesh's father was killed years ago. His killer died too... or so he thought. Case closed he soon discovers the killer is still alive & decides to avenge his father's murder himself.

programme.title: Jism
programme.desc: (2003) Kabir (John Abraham) loves a married lady named Sonia (Bipasha) who instigates him to kill her husband. Kabir agrees, unaware that Sonia has other plans up her sleeve.

programme.title: Heer Tey Tedhi Kheer
programme.desc: (R) Fate brings a clumsy but cheerful Heer and DJ, a rigid man, together in marriage. Can Heer overcome the challenge of being a mother-in-law to his three older daughters-in-law?

programme.desc: (R) Gurman gives her son away to her friend Prabhjot and adopts her daughter, Keerat, in his place. Years later, Keerat marries Gurman's biological son. Will Prabhjot accept her as a daughter-in-law?

programme.title: The Sugarland Express
programme.desc: Goldie Hawn busts her husband out of jail, kidnaps a cop and goes on the run in Texas. Crime drama from Steven Spielberg. Violence/flashing images/stereo sound only. (1974)(106 mins).

programme.title: Marnie
programme.desc: Tippi Hedren lies, steals and hates men. But Sean Connery only finds out why after blackmailing her into marriage. From Alfred Hitchcock. Mature themes/flashing images. (1964)(125 mins).

programme.title: Sunset Boulevard
programme.desc: Gloria Swanson is the forgotten silent movie star who hires bankrupt screenwriter William Holden to pen her comeback script. Oscar-winning drama directed by Billy Wilder. (1950)(105 mins).

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: Funny and perceptive comedy-drama about the trials and tribulations of parenthood. With Steve Martin, Mary Steenburgen, Keanu Reeves and Rick Moranis. (1989)(118 mins).

programme.title: It Came From Outer Space
programme.desc: Eerie, vintage sci-fi tale based on a Ray Bradbury story. A writer sees a strange craft crash in the Arizona desert, but none of the townsfolk believe him. (1953)(77 mins).

programme.title: Kinky Boots
programme.desc: In an attempt to save the family shoe factory from financial ruin, Charlie creates a line of sexy footwear that's modelled by a vivacious drag queen with perfect feet. (2005)(103 mins).

programme.desc: The story of American scientist Robert Oppenheimer and his role in the development of the atomic bomb. Christopher Nolan's multi-Oscar-winning drama. (2023)(173 mins).

programme.title: American Gigolo
programme.desc: Richard Gere is the male escort framed for murder in this stylised and sexy 80s thriller from Taxi Driver writer Paul Schrader. Contains discriminatory language. (1980)(112 mins).

programme.desc: Sam Mendes directs this Gulf War drama starring Jake Gyllenhaal as the marine awaiting action in the Saudi Arabian desert. Strong language/violence/sex/flashing images. (2005)(118 mins).

programme.desc: Forced into early retirement by a degenerative illness, former baseball player Ray Waller moves into a new house with his wife and two children.
